name: stirling-pdf
description: Stirling-PDF is a self-hosted all-in-one PDF toolkit that supports merging, splitting, converting, editing, and OCR through a powerful web interface.
features: PDF merging: Combines multiple PDF files into a single document.
PDF splitting: Extracts specific pages or splits PDFs into separate files.
Format conversion: Converts PDFs to images, Word, Excel, or other formats and vice versa.
OCR processing: Extracts text from scanned PDFs using optical character recognition.
Page manipulation: Rotates, reorders, or removes pages from PDF documents.
Compression: Reduces PDF file size while maintaining acceptable quality.
Watermarking: Adds text or image watermarks to PDF pages.
Form filling: Fills PDF forms and flattens form fields.
Encryption: Password-protects PDFs with user and owner permissions.
Signature support: Adds digital signatures to PDF documents.
Metadata editing: Modifies PDF metadata like title, author, and keywords.
Batch processing: Processes multiple PDFs simultaneously for efficiency.
